mapper.insert: insert into bbs_comment ( bbs_no, com_no, user_no, com_content, com_date, com_show ) values ( #{bbsNo}, NVL(((select MAX(com_no) from bbs_comment where bbs_no=#{bbsNo} )+1) , 1), 1, #{comContent}, sysdate, 0 );
mapper.select: select a.BBS_NO, a.COM_NO, a.USER_NO, a.COM_CONTENT, a.COM_DATE, a.COM_SHOW, b.user_nick from bbs_comment a, users b where bbs_no =#{bbsNo} and a.user_no = b.user_no order by com_date desc
